author: Audrey McNamara
title: UN food agency chief: World could see famines of "biblical proportions" within months
description: He said there's "a real danger that more people could potentially die from the economic impact of COVID-19 than from the virus itself."
content: David Beasley, director of the United Nations World Food Program, warned Tuesday that the world is on "the brink of a hunger pandemic" as it grapples with the global coronavirus crisis. He said that without action, the world could face "multiple famines of bi… [+2944 chars]
